00027 ChunkBase::ChunkBase ( size_t nrOfColumns, size_t nrOfRows, size_t nrOfSlices, size_t nrOfTimesteps )
00028 {
00029     const size_t idx[] = {nrOfColumns, nrOfRows, nrOfSlices, nrOfTimesteps};
00030     init( idx );
00031     addNeededFromString( neededProperties );
00032     LOG_IF( NDimensional<4>::getVolume() == 0, Debug, warning )
00033             << "Size " << nrOfTimesteps << "|" << nrOfSlices << "|" << nrOfRows << "|" << nrOfColumns << " is invalid";
00034 }
00035 
00036 ChunkBase::~ChunkBase() { }
00037 
00038 }

00040 Chunk::Chunk( const ValuePtrReference &src, size_t nrOfColumns, size_t nrOfRows, size_t nrOfSlices, size_t nrOfTimesteps ):
00041     _internal::ChunkBase( nrOfColumns, nrOfRows, nrOfSlices, nrOfTimesteps ),
00042     ValuePtrReference( src )
00043 {
00044     assert( ( *this )->getLength() == getVolume() );
00045 }
00046 
00047 Chunk Chunk::cloneToNew( size_t nrOfColumns, size_t nrOfRows, size_t nrOfSlices, size_t nrOfTimesteps )const
00048 {
00049     util::FixedVector<size_t, 4> newSize = getSizeAsVector();
00050 
00051     if ( nrOfColumns )newSize[0] = nrOfColumns;
00052 
00053     if ( nrOfRows )newSize[1] = nrOfRows;
00054 
00055     if ( nrOfSlices )newSize[2] = nrOfSlices;
00056 
00057     if ( nrOfTimesteps )newSize[3] = nrOfTimesteps;
00058 
00059     const ValuePtrReference cloned( getValuePtrBase().cloneToNew( newSize.product() ) );
00060     return Chunk( cloned, newSize[0], newSize[1], newSize[2], newSize[3] );
00061 }
00062 
00063 bool Chunk::convertToType( short unsigned int ID, scaling_pair scaling )
00064 {
00065     //get a converted ValuePtr (will be a cheap copy if no conv was needed)
00066     ValuePtrReference newPtr = asValuePtrBase().convertByID( ID, scaling );
00067 
00068     if( newPtr.isEmpty() ) // if the reference is empty the conversion failed
00069         return false;
00070     else
00071         static_cast<ValuePtrReference &>( *this ) = newPtr; // otherwise replace my own ValuePtr with the new one
00072 
00073     return true;
00074 }

00089 void Chunk::copySlice( size_t thirdDimS, size_t fourthDimS, Chunk &dst, size_t thirdDimD, size_t fourthDimD ) const
00090 {
00091     const size_t idx1[] = {0, 0, thirdDimS, fourthDimS};
00092     const size_t idx2[] = {getSizeAsVector()[0] - 1, getSizeAsVector()[1] - 1, thirdDimS, fourthDimS};
00093     const size_t idx3[] = {0, 0, thirdDimD, fourthDimD};
00094     copyRange( idx1, idx2, dst, idx3 );
00095 }
00096 
00097 void Chunk::copyRange( const size_t source_start[], const size_t source_end[], Chunk &dst, const size_t destination[] ) const
00098 {
00099     LOG_IF( ! isInRange( source_start ), Debug, error )
00100             << "Copy start " << util::FixedVector<size_t, 4>( source_start )
00101             << " is out of range (" << getSizeAsString() << ") at the source chunk";
00102     LOG_IF( ! isInRange( source_end ), Debug, error )
00103             << "Copy end " << util::FixedVector<size_t, 4>( source_end )
00104             << " is out of range (" << getSizeAsString() << ") at the source chunk";
00105     LOG_IF( ! dst.isInRange( destination ), Debug, error )
00106             << "Index " << util::FixedVector<size_t, 4>( destination )
00107             << " is out of range (" << getSizeAsString() << ") at the destination chunk";
00108     const size_t sstart = getLinearIndex( source_start );
00109     const size_t send = getLinearIndex( source_end );
00110     const size_t dstart = dst.getLinearIndex( destination );
00111     getValuePtrBase().copyRange( sstart, send, *dst, dstart );
00112 }
00113 
00114 size_t Chunk::compareRange( const size_t source_start[], const size_t source_end[], const Chunk &dst, const size_t destination[] ) const
00115 {
00116     LOG_IF( ! isInRange( source_start ), Debug, error )
00117             << "memcmp start " << util::FixedVector<size_t, 4>( source_start )
00118             << " is out of range (" << getSizeAsString() << ") at the first chunk";
00119     LOG_IF( ! isInRange( source_end ), Debug, error )
00120             << "memcmp end " << util::FixedVector<size_t, 4>( source_end )
00121             << " is out of range (" << getSizeAsString() << ") at the first chunk";
00122     LOG_IF( ! dst.isInRange( destination ), Debug, error )
00123             << "Index " << util::FixedVector<size_t, 4>( destination )
00124             << " is out of range (" << getSizeAsString() << ") at the second chunk";
00125     LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00126             << "Comparing range from " << util::FixedVector<size_t, 4>( source_start ) << " to " << util::FixedVector<size_t, 4>( source_end )
00127             << " and " << util::FixedVector<size_t, 4>( destination );
00128     const size_t sstart = getLinearIndex( source_start );
00129     const size_t send = getLinearIndex( source_end );
00130     const size_t dstart = dst.getLinearIndex( destination );
00131     return getValuePtrBase().compare( sstart, send, dst.getValuePtrBase(), dstart );
00132 }
00133 size_t Chunk::compare( const isis::data::Chunk &dst ) const
00134 {
00135     if( getSizeAsVector() == dst.getSizeAsVector() )
00136         return getValuePtrBase().compare( 0, getVolume() - 1, dst.getValuePtrBase(), 0 );
00137     else
00138         return std::max( getVolume(), dst.getVolume() );
00139 }

00156 Chunk &Chunk::operator=( const Chunk &ref )
00157 {
00158     _internal::ChunkBase::operator=( static_cast<const _internal::ChunkBase &>( ref ) ); //copy the metadate of ref
00159     ValuePtrReference::operator=( static_cast<const ValuePtrReference &>( ref ) ); // copy the reference of ref's data
00160     return *this;
00161 }
00162 
00163 std::list<Chunk> Chunk::autoSplice ( uint32_t acquisitionNumberStride )const
00164 {
00165     if ( !isValid() ) {
00166         LOG( Runtime, error ) << "Cannot splice invalid Chunk (missing properties are " << this->getMissing() << ")";
00167         return std::list<Chunk>();
00168     }
00169 
00170     util::fvector4 offset;
00171     const util::fvector4 voxelSize = propertyValue( "voxelSize" )->castTo<util::fvector4>();
00172     util::fvector4 voxelGap;
00173 
00174     if( hasProperty( "voxelGap" ) )
00175         voxelGap = propertyValue( "voxelGap" )->castTo<util::fvector4>();
00176 
00177     const util::fvector4 distance = voxelSize + voxelGap;
00178     size_t atDim = getRelevantDims() - 1;
00179 
00180     switch( atDim ) { // init offset with the given direction
00181     case rowDim :
00182         offset = this->propertyValue( "rowVec" )->castTo<util::fvector4>();
00183         break;
00184     case columnDim:
00185         offset = this->propertyValue( "columnVec" )->castTo<util::fvector4>();
00186         break;
00187     case sliceDim:
00188 
00189         if( this->hasProperty( "sliceVec" ) ) {
00190             offset = this->propertyValue( "sliceVec" )->castTo<util::fvector4>();
00191         } else {
00192             const util::fvector4 row = this->propertyValue( "rowVec" )->castTo<util::fvector4>();
00193             const util::fvector4 column = this->propertyValue( "columnVec" )->castTo<util::fvector4>();
00194             assert( util::fuzzyEqual<float>( row.sqlen(), 1 ) );
00195             assert( util::fuzzyEqual<float>( column.sqlen(), 1 ) );
00196             offset[0] = row[1] * column[2] - row[2] * column[1];
00197             offset[1] = row[2] * column[0] - row[0] * column[2];
00198             offset[2] = row[0] * column[1] - row[1] * column[0];
00199         }
00200 
00201         break;
00202     case timeDim :
00203         offset = util::fvector4( 0, 0, 0, 1 );
00204     }
00205 
00206     // prepare some attributes
00207     assert( util::fuzzyEqual<float>( offset.sqlen(), 1 ) ); // it should be norm here
00208     const util::fvector4 indexOriginOffset = offset * distance[atDim];
00209     
00210     LOG( Debug, info ) << "Splicing chunk at dimenstion " << atDim + 1 << " with indexOrigin stride " << indexOriginOffset << " and acquisitionNumberStride " << acquisitionNumberStride;
00211     std::list<Chunk> ret = splice( ( dimensions )atDim ); // do low level splice - get the chunklist
00212 
00213     std::list<Chunk>::iterator it=ret.begin();it++;// skip the first one
00214     
00215     for(size_t cnt=1;it!=ret.end();it++,cnt++) { // adapt some metadata in them
00216         util::fvector4 &orig = it->propertyValue( "indexOrigin" )->castTo<util::fvector4>();
00217         if(orig==ret.front().getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "indexOrigin" )){ // fix pos if its the same as for the first
00218             LOG( Debug, verbose_info ) << "Origin was " << orig << " will be moved by " << indexOriginOffset << "*"  << cnt;
00219             orig = orig + indexOriginOffset * ( float )cnt;
00220         }
00221 
00222         uint32_t &acq = it->propertyValue( "acquisitionNumber" )->castTo<uint32_t>();
00223         if(acq==ret.front().getPropertyAs<uint32_t>("acquisitionNumber")){
00224             LOG( Debug, verbose_info ) << "acquisitionNumber was " << acq << " will be moved by " << acquisitionNumberStride << "*"  << cnt;
00225             acq += acquisitionNumberStride * cnt; //@todo this might cause trouble if we try to insert this chunks into an image
00226         }
00227     }
00228     return ret;
00229 }
00230 
00231 std::list<Chunk> Chunk::splice ( dimensions atDim )const
00232 {
00233     std::list<Chunk> ret;
00234     
00235     //@todo should be locking
00236     typedef std::vector<ValuePtrReference> ValuePtrList;
00237     const util::FixedVector<size_t, dims> wholesize = getSizeAsVector();
00238     util::FixedVector<size_t, dims> spliceSize;
00239     spliceSize.fill( 1 ); //init size of one chunk-splice to 1x1x1x1
00240     //copy the relevant dimensional sizes from wholesize (in case of sliceDim we copy only the first two elements of wholesize - making slices)
00241     spliceSize.copyFrom( &wholesize[0], &wholesize[atDim] );
00242     //get the spliced ValuePtr's (the volume of the requested dims is the split-size - in case of sliceDim it is rows*columns)
00243     const ValuePtrList pointers = this->getValuePtrBase().splice( spliceSize.product() );
00244 
00245     const util::PropertyMap::KeyList lists=this->findLists();
00246     size_t list_idx=0;
00247 
00248     //create new Chunks from this ValuePtr's
00249     BOOST_FOREACH( ValuePtrList::const_reference ref, pointers ) {
00250         ret.push_back( Chunk( ref, spliceSize[0], spliceSize[1], spliceSize[2], spliceSize[3] ) ); //@todo make sure this is only one copy-operation
00251         static_cast<util::PropertyMap &>( ret.back() ) = static_cast<const util::PropertyMap &>( *this ); // copy all props into the splices
00252         BOOST_FOREACH(const util::PropertyMap::KeyType &key,lists){ // override list-entries in the splices with their respective entries
00253             ret.back().propertyValue(key)=this->propertyValueAt(key,list_idx);
00254         }
00255 //      std::cout << static_cast<util::PropertyMap &>( ret.back() ) << std::endl;
00256         list_idx++;
00257     }
00258     return ret;
00259 }

00261 size_t Chunk::useCount() const

00263     return getValuePtrBase().useCount();

00265 
00266 void Chunk::swapAlong( const dimensions dim ) const
00267 {
00268     const size_t elSize = bytesPerVoxel();
00269     const util::FixedVector<size_t, 4> whole_size = getSizeAsVector();
00270     const util::FixedVector<size_t, 4> outer_size = whole_size;
00271 
00272     boost::shared_ptr<uint8_t> swap_ptr = boost::shared_static_cast<uint8_t>( get()->getRawAddress() );
00273     uint8_t *swap_start = swap_ptr.get();
00274     const uint8_t *const swap_end = swap_start + whole_size.product() * elSize;
00275 
00276     size_t block_volume = whole_size.product();
00277 
00278     for( int i = data::timeDim; i >= dim; i-- ) {
00279         assert( ( block_volume % whole_size[i] ) == 0 );
00280         block_volume /= whole_size[i];
00281     }
00282 
00283     assert( block_volume );
00284     block_volume *= elSize;
00285     const size_t swap_volume = block_volume * whole_size[dim];
00286     const std::auto_ptr<uint8_t> buff( static_cast<uint8_t *>( malloc( block_volume ) ) );
00287 
00288     //iterate over all swap-volumes
00289     for( ; swap_start < swap_end; swap_start += swap_volume ) { //outer loop
00290         // swap each block with the one at the oppsite end of the swap_volume
00291         uint8_t *a = swap_start; //first block
00292         uint8_t *b = swap_start + swap_volume - block_volume; //last block within the swap-volume
00293 
00294         for( ; a < b; a += block_volume, b -= block_volume ) { // grow a, shrink b (inner loop)
00295             memcpy( buff.get(), a, block_volume );
00296             memcpy( a, b, block_volume );
00297             memcpy( b, buff.get(), block_volume );
00298         }
00299 
00300     }
00301 }
00302 
00303 util::PropertyValue &Chunk::propertyValueAt( const util::PropertyMap::KeyType &key, size_t at )
00304 {
00305     std::vector< util::PropertyValue > &vec = propertyValueVec( key );
00306     const size_t cSize = getSizeAsVector()[getRelevantDims()-1];
00307 
00308     if( vec.size() != cSize ) {
00309         LOG( Debug, info ) << "Resizing sub-property " << key << " to size of the chunk (" << cSize  << ")";
00310         vec.resize( cSize );
00311     }
00312 
00313     return vec.at( at );
00314 }
00315 const util::PropertyValue &Chunk::propertyValueAt( const util::PropertyMap::KeyType &key, size_t at ) const
00316 {
00317     const std::vector< util::PropertyValue > &vec = propertyValueVec( key );
00318     const size_t cSize = getSizeAsVector()[getRelevantDims()-1];
00319     LOG_IF( vec.size() != cSize, Debug, warning ) << "Sub-property " << key << " does not have the size of the chunk (" << cSize  << ")";
00320     return vec.at( at );
00321 }
